text: Vacha () is an urban locality (a work settlement) and the administrative center of Vachsky District of Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia. Population: ==History== It was founded in 1588. Urban-type settlement status was granted to it in 1938. ==References== Category:Urban-type settlements in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast Category:Muromsky Uyezd
title: Vacha, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
